Cook pasta to al dente                                                                                                                            In separate pot melt butter, whisk in flour and mustard for a bout 5 mins. Stir in milk, onion, bay leaf, and paprika. Simmer for 10mins, remove bay leaf.                                                                                          Temper in eggs. Stir in 3/4 of the cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Fold in pasta. Pour mixture into baiking pan. Top with remaining cheese.                                                                                                      Topping: Melt butter in sautee pan and bread crumbs and coat with butter. Top mac & cheese with bread crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes @ 350.  let rest before serving.
